segments.text: I notice the boy on the stool, reaching for the cookie jar like it’s the most important thing in the world.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His stool is wobbling, and I can’t believe he hasn’t fallen yet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is waiting patiently, her hand outstretched, ready to receive her share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They’re both so focused on the cookies that they don’t see the danger right in front of them.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is pooling on the floor, and I’m just waiting for someone to slip.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is completely unaware, and it’s driving me crazy.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Why isn’t she paying attention to what’s happening?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy’s balance is terrible, and the stool looks like it’s about to collapse.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe how reckless they’re being.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole scene is a mess, and no one seems to care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think someone is going to get hurt, and it’s going to be ugly.
segments.speaker: PAR
